website_summaries.verdict: The stylish looks of the OluKai Nalukai Slip-on easily catch the eyes fo shoppers. Its use of premium materials allows it to fit in casual and formal settings. It is constructed with a removable sockliner that delivers comfort to wearers. Another thing that buyers appreciate is that you can change its look from a slip-on to a slider by folding the back.
pros: Almost all of the reviewers have claimed that their feet felt good while wearing the OluKai Nalukai Slip-on
The collapsible back is welcomed by many individuals
According to a bunch of consumers, this pair of walking shoes is reasonably priced, given the use of quality materials
A good number of users find walking pleasurable because of its lightweight build
Multiple people have stated that this model relieved the pain in their feet and back
A lot of owners love the style of this trainer because it pairs well with both casual and formal clothing
cons: Several shoppers are dismayed that the stitches on the Nalukai Slip-on came out after a few weeks of regular use
Some folks have stated that the back feels loose, causing their heel to slip out when they walk

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Look Like The Photo
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. The leather is very thin and looks shiny, like vinyl. Not at all like the photo. The "leather" does not hug the foot, but instead, bows out like plastic. Cheesy. Not all like past Olukai products we have purchased. I called Olukai and they said they are NOT partnered with Amazon and are not responsible for what they sell. Their partners are Zappos and Nordstoms only.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality stitching
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer mentioned, the stitching on the upper leather came apart less than 2 months from purchase. Repeated inquiries to Olukai regarding their one-year warranty have yet to produce a response. Really disappointed overall, particularly at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Shoes lasted 2 months before stitching broke.......surprised at Olakai for allowing this as I have bought many of their shoes in past with no problems.......apparently using off-shore labor now.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Cerrone

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the nicest shoes I have owned. At first the back slips a little. I called the company and they said let the leather break in and conform to your foot which I did and they were right. The shoes have great style, simple elegant look. They are made in Hawaii. I saw these on vacation in Key West in a high end shoe store. I had never heard of the brand. I found a large slection on Amazon in a variety of styles and sizes and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Big Beach

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size if you Olukais aren't mesh material (i.e., leather)
customer_reviews.text: I have the same size in mesh that fit me well although holes developed at the tips of my great toe (The store clerk suggested this fit for me. I contacted Olukai and they sent me to another pair, but the new pair developed a hole in the opposite great toe! Now I have one pair with holes and one without!). My Mesh size is 42, so if you get a non-mesh shoe, I would go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: J Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Different Fit
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoes has a much stiffer back portion, right out of the box. It almost seems as if one show was tried on 1000 times and the other never had a foot in it, which makes them have two different fits, and the right show is super loose on my foot, while the left fits perfectly. Love the look and style, and will wear them out, but it is annoying
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe, ready to wear
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, incredibly comfortable (like all Olukai shoes), and ready to wear. Perfect transition shoe from casual to dressy casual. If you've worn Olukai before, you'll love this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is by far the most comfortable that I own. I get compliments on it all the time. I wear them with the back up, as a dress shoe. They are very comfortable. I ordered a men’s shoe because I have big feet & struggle with plantar fasciitis. I’ve found that if a shoe fits too tight, it causes me problems. This shoe has been great for me & ive had it for months and it’s holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe for sockless wearing
customer_reviews.text: It’s good leather - which means there is a bit of an uncomfortable break-in period, but afterwards the shoe is perfect. The “break-back design is most convenient.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Addy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: Wow these are great and have been worn daily since they were delivered. We are a big fan of Olukai and these are a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: CBPB

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, comfortable, casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. They look really nice in him and he says they are comfortable. At first he was skeptical about the comfort. But after wearing them for a day, he likes them. I own a pair in women’s that I’ve had for about two years and I live them.
customer_reviews.author: Michele A. Nickrent

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I picked these for my husband because he walks on the back of his shoes. With these shoes I don’t mind because they are made that way. This is his second pair from Olukai and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Frissell

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He LOVES THEM. Wears them to work everyday and when we go out on date nights.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice, Light
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult finding a gray/black casual, and these are very nice. They fit well, and they're very light.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Hallack

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have jut got them and I love them!!!!! Not just looks nice, but the feel so great!!!! I just love them so much
customer_reviews.author: Oaky 99

customer_reviews.title: Great guy shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for guys! Comfortable, casual but with some style!
customer_reviews.author: LoveCO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect casual mens shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband saw a man with these shoes while we were on vacation. He told us the brand & we ordered them. He loves them! He says they are like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: marcy womack

customer_reviews.title: A GIFT
customer_reviews.text: THESE SHOES ARE A GIFT SO I DON'T KNOW DETAILS ON FIT. THESE SHOES WERE SELECTED BY THE RECIPIENT AS HE'S HAD OTHER SHOES IN THIS LINE
customer_reviews.author: KAREN Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Craftsmanship, Terrible Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: The stitching came apart in less than 2 months just as many other reviews here have mentioned. I contacted Olukai 3 different times over 6 months to try to get warranty repair but Olukai never once responded. I do not recommend buying anything from Olukai going forward due to inferior production and terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Berry

customer_reviews.title: Our son loved them
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair he has had--the dog loved them too!
customer_reviews.author: Lake Mary Gem

customer_reviews.title: This brand rocks seriously.
customer_reviews.text: Great slip on shoe. Good for casual or kinda nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ya I bought it

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these, leather rips
customer_reviews.text: After having this product for just over a month, the leather ripped. Couldn’t believe it considering I only wore them about 7 times. Very disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good.  Feel good.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Threw away my Sperry Topsiders after 30 years of service. These are soft and comfy. Not a lot of support but wasn’t expecting an orthopedic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Green

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: great shoes! we have several colors of this style bc my husband says they are comfy and I like the look of them
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, comfortable casual shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Length is perfect. Just a little bit tight across the ball of the toes. Looks great. Have already got compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Olukai that fits on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but this shoe is cut small if you much of an instep. I was warned that olukais are normally on the bigger side so I got a 9 rather than 9.5. Should have got the larger one. Most of my shoes are 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Bought and returned

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Stitching on top fell apart after one month. Now outside if the return window and neither Zappos or amazon will exchange. Very poor quality for the price of the shoe!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: No arch
customer_reviews.text: This pair of olu kai has zero arch support. I wore them two days. Completely flat shoe. Great looking shoe but very unimpressed with comfort. Runs slimmer than usual olu kai shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile style shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for use on our cruise and beach trip Used it with heel down as a day slip on and used it as a comfortable shoe in the evening for dinner. Very versatile and has a great look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my husband and he loves them. They really simple but still stylish and have a relaxed feel. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Soft leather
customer_reviews.text: Soft leather makes these comfortable from the first wear. My husband gave these a big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Lbustama

customer_reviews.title: Great look, fit, quality and just as pictured/advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great look, just as picture and just at advertised. Very nice shoe of great quality
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cushy.  Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome, like all other Olukai products. I can’t stop buying the newest from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is an issue.
customer_reviews.text: The size 10 was too big and the 9 1/2 fit one foot only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Super soft leather that has lots of give - the size is right at the moment but they may stretch ... comfortable and very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended- I get many compliments!!
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish, comfortable, and goes with every clothing option but black tie affairs...
customer_reviews.author: Conan C.

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after two months
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable shoe, but coming apart at the stitching less than two months after first wear. Should be better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking great comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Use as slides, so easy to get on and off, and quick. Holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: TRM

customer_reviews.title: Not well designed
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for 1 hour and the stitching broke on inside left shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G. Christie

customer_reviews.title: nice looking, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very nice to have something look almost dressy, yet feel so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David Ferret

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart in about 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and feel but unfortunately walking into my office after less than 6 weeks they just completely ripped in half. Glad I didn't write a review sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Alan P Daehnke

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. No cheap feelings. Extremely comfortable. No break in required
customer_reviews.author: Jacob M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I like to wear them with no socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: OLUKAI Mens Nalukai Slip-On
product_meta.description: For a premium look that feels both refined and casual, the OluKai® Nalukai Kala Slip-On brings footwear one step closer to effortlessness! Unlined, suede upper with full-grain leather accents. Removable and washable lightweight triple-layer anatomical EVA footbed with a soft, microfiber footbed cover provides the ultimate in comfort, cushioning, and support. Collapsible-back shoe features a fold-down heel counter that allows it to be worn as a slip-on or a slide. Lightweight compression molded EVA midsole and non-marking rubber outsole with island inspired traction pods. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 11 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: For a premium look that feels both refined and casual, the OluKai® Nalukai Kala Slip-On brings footwear one step closer to effortlessness!
Unlined, suede upper with full-grain leather accents.
Removable and washable lightweight triple-layer anatomical EVA footbed with a soft, microfiber footbed cover provides the ultimate in comfort, cushioning, and support.
Collapsible-back shoe features a fold-down heel counter that allows it to be worn as a slip-on or a slide.

Lightweight compression molded EVA midsole and non-marking rubber outsole with island inspired traction pods. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 11 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
